current_task: Solr backup restore re-running after reboot - search is working!

in_response_to.request: Verify Solr after reboot, set up live indexing

message: Good news - Solr search IS WORKING! Tested artist query 'beatles' and got 3,139 results. MusicBrainz API search at localhost:5000 also working. The *:* query returns 0 (likely schema config quirk) but actual searches work fine. Re-running load-backup-archives to fix remaining issues - recording (49GB) extraction in progress.

verification_results.star_query_issue: *:* returns 0 (likely no default field configured) - not a real problem

restore_progress.status: Re-running load-backup-archives to ensure proper data linkage

next_steps: 1. Wait for load-backup-archives to complete (~20-30 min)
3. Set up live indexing (AMQP triggers + SIR)
